Writer: Stephen Sommers (story), Jonathan Hales (story), Stephen Sommers (screenplay), William Osborne (screenplay), David Hayter (screenplay)
Title: The Scorpion King
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Michael Clarke Duncan, Kelly Hu
Plot: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.
